fee_sharing.title: Fee Sharing

flexible_staking.title: Flexible Staking
flexible_staking.description: Stake to unlock platform benefits and fee discounts. Your rewards grow based on your engagement in the ecosystem.

how_it_works.title: How It Works
how_it_works.point1: Stake once every 24 hours to increase your position and boost your eligibility for rewards
how_it_works.point2: Rewards adjust based on your participation level and overall network activity
how_it_works.point3: No fixed APY - incentives grow with ecosystem usage and your stake amount

tiers.title: Staking Tiers & Benefits
tiers.disclaimer: Crypto involves risk. Rewards vary and are not guaranteed based on platform usage.
